name: Quick Heist Harry
description:
Help Harry get as much gold as he can in 60 seconds! Get paid more for doing the job faster! Harry has the ability to throw gold bars, but it'll cost him 5 gold! Gold can be thrown to kill guards and break glass! Try your best not to kill too many guards, Harry has to pay for each guard that dies.

This game was made for Mini Jam 85.

The theme was 'Gold' and the limitation was 'One-Minute Timer'

(For those who are interested, score is calculated by (Gold * Time remaining) - (Cops Killed * 10) )

Controls:

Arrows - Move

Z - Jump

X - Shoot

C - Take Gold
